directions: Whisk oil, vinegar and garlic in large bowl to blend. Working over bowl with dressing, cut oranges between membranes, releasing segments into bowl. Add onion, bell pepper, tuna, olives and parsley; toss. Season with salt and pepper. (Can be made 2 hours ahead. Cover; refrigerate.)
Divide salad greens among plates. Spoon tuna salad over, dividing equally. Garnish with almonds.
ingredients: 3 seedless oranges, peel and white pith removed
1 small red onion, halved, thinly sliced
1 9-ounce can white meat tuna packed in water, drained well, separated into chunks
title: Tuna Salad with Olives, Orange and Bell Pepper
